text: Natural beauty takes at least two hours in front of a mirror.
author: Pamela Anderson

text: It is not the beauty of a building you should look at its the construction of the foundation that will stand the test of time.
author: David Allan Coe

text: One of the things that people don't realize is that that natural beauty, those recreational forests, they have an economic development impact for the state as well.
author: Ed Rendell

text: Endeavour to be faithful, and if there is any beauty in your thought, your style will be beautiful if there is any real emotion to express, the expression will be moving.
author: George Henry Lewes
